form.describe_textarea_description: Do not type personal information in this description. We will ask this of you later in this form.
form.describe_upload_description: Add a photo to clarify the situation (maximum of 5 photos).

errors.textarea_required: Input error: enter what the notification is about
errors.file_type_invalid: Invalid file type. Only JPEG, PNG, and GIF are accepted.
errors.file_size_too_large: File size too large. Each file must be less than 20MB.
errors.file_size_too_small: File size too small. Each file must be at least 30KB.

alert.help_text: Having trouble submitting a report? Call:

map.dialog_description: Choose a location on the map for the location of your report.
map.outside_max_bound_error: Your location is outside the map bounds and is therefore not visible.
map.max_number_of_assets_error: You can select at most {max, plural, one {# object} other {# objects}}.
map.zoom_for_object: Zoom in to see the objects
map.use_map_description: Or select a point on the map

address.no_results: No addresses found, please check your spelling or try a less specific search.

form.heading: May we call you for questions? And keep you informed via e-mail?
form.description:
Often we have another question. With this we can solve the problem faster or better. Or we want to explain something. We would then like to give you a call. Or else we e-mail you.

We only use your phone number and e-mail address for this report.
form.send_to_other_instance_description: Sometimes the municipality cannot do anything. Another organization must then get to work. If so, we can sometimes forward your report. We send your phone number or e-mail address along with it. But we only do that if you agree.
form.describe_checkbox_input_description: Yes, I give the municipality {organization} permission to forward my report to other organizations if the report is not intended for the Municipality.
form.no_contact_details: You have not entered contact information. We cannot let you know what we have done with your report.

errors.number_exceeds_max_characters: You have entered more than the maximum {maxLength} characters.
errors.number_invalid_character: Invalid phone number, only digits, spaces, brackets, + and - are allowed.
errors.email_not_valid: Enter a valid email address, with an @ and a domain name. For example: naam@domein.nl

describe_summary.heading: Submit
describe_summary.description: Check your information and submit your report.

error.heading: Submit failed
error.description: Due to a technical error, the report could not be sent. We did not receive your information. Please try again in a few minutes.

loading.heading: Processing
loading.description:
Your report is being processed. You will automatically go to the next page once the report is received.

Please wait a moment....

describe_thankyou.heading: Thank you!
describe_thankyou.description_notification_number: Your notification is registered with us under number:
describe_thankyou.description_notification_email: Did you provide an email address? You will receive an email with all the details of your notification.
describe_thankyou.what_do_we_do_heading: What do we do with your notification?
describe_thankyou.what_do_we_do_description: Your notification is scheduled: we will inform you within 5 working days about how and when your notification will be handled. We will do this via email.

errors.max_length: This field has a maximal length of {maxLength} characters
errors.is_blocking: You cannot complete this form any further. Read below the answers where you can, however, submit your report.

current_organisation.name: City of Utrecht
current_organisation.default_logo_label: Logo of municipality {organization}, click for homepage
